title: Grapes, Goat Cheese And Mixed Leaves
summary: Need a gluten free, fodmap friendly, and vegetarian main course? Grapes, Goat Cheese And Mixed Leaves could be an excellent recipe to try. This recipe serves 1. One portion of this dish contains about 17g of protein, 28g of fat, and a total of 521 calories. For $3.71 per serving, this recipe covers 21% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 2 people found this recipe to be delicious and satisfying. Head to the store and pick up goat cheese, leaves, dressing: extra virgin olive oil, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the extra-virgin olive oil you could follow this main course with the Chocolate Date Caramel Walnut Tart (Gluten-Free, Grain-Free, Vegan) as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 76%, this dish is good. Try Goat Cheese, Lentils And Mixed Leaves, Melon, Grapes And Goat Cheese, and Goat Cheese Stuffed Grape Leaves for similar recipes.
